Hydras:

"Then, my dear Maxima"replied Hydras"YOur mission is clear, but you 
will need a little help to find my spy, or he finds you..."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 2/17/03 11:29:58 AM Central Standard Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "Patient little one, Patient"hissed Hydras with a indulgent 
tone"A 
> > wrong step and all would be messed up"
> > 
> 
> Little one? Her optics narrowed. For a fleeting moment she thought 
about 
> tackling him to show him that she was not as weak as she looked. 
But, it soon 
> disappated from her mind.
> 
> "Understood." For now. She would wait... watch... plot. Then make 
her move. 
> 
> She didn't realize that her one 'paw' was still in his hand until 
she moved 
> to clasp her hands behind her. The one hand stationary. Her optics 
went down 
> to her hand in his, then her optics went up to his. Curious why 
they were 
> still holding hands. 'Such rubblish,' she thought. But, in some 
other ways, 
> she didn't mind. 
> 
> Then her optics went back to the map as she continued to take in 
the 
> locations.
